DOC.HEAD: $Adv22
For release Friday, Dec. 22, and thereafter
DOC.TEXT: The following are the most popular videocassettes for the year 1989 as they appear in next week's issue of Billboard magazine. Copyright 1989, Billboard Publications, Inc. Reprinted with permission.

1.``Cinderella'' (Disney) 2.``E.T.
